## Quantity {.t2}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}

- Video of quantity report
- See video from ZiHBS slides: suso_course/docs/slides/18_monitor_with_suso.html#/quantity

:::

::: {.column width="30%"}

### Why

- Plan for N interviews completed per time period
- Check whether plan holds

### How

- Select indicator under `Interview action`
- Select questionnaire and version
- Select coverage:
  - Start date
  - Period

:::
